unnormalised: Delhi folks, heads up! The Ind vs. Aus cricket match tomorrow, 10/11/2024, is gonna be a nail-biter. But remember, Sydney is way ahead of us. Kickoff is at 2:30 PM AEDT, which translates to a sleepy 9:00 AM IST for us here in India. So, set your alarms, grab your chai, and get ready to cheer Team India from the get-go!
normalised: Delhi folks, heads up! The India versus Australia cricket match tomorrow, tenth november two thousand and twenty four, is gonna be a nail-biter. But remember, Sydney is way ahead of us. Kickoff is at two thirty P-M A-E-D-T, which translates to a sleepy nine zero zero A-M I-S-T for us here in India. So, set your alarms, grab your chai, and get ready to cheer Team India from the get-go!

unnormalised: For those in Mumbai, it's the same 9 AM start time. Meanwhile, Bangalore peeps, no difference for you either – still 9:00 AM. But our friends in Dubai? Lucky you! The match starts at 7:30 AM GST, so you can enjoy it with your morning coffee.
normalised: For those in Mumbai, it's the same nine A-M start time. Meanwhile, Bangalore peeps, no difference for you either – still nine zero zero A-M. But our friends in Dubai? Lucky you! The match starts at seven thirty A-M G-S-T, so you can enjoy it with your morning coffee.

unnormalised: And to our NRI supporters in London, the match kicks off at 3:30 AM GMT. A bit early, yeah? But hey, nothing stops a true fan! Just prep your coffee machine the night before.
normalised: And to our N-R-I supporters in London, the match kicks off at three thirty A-M G-M-T. A bit early, yeah? But hey, nothing stops a true fan! Just prep your coffee machine the night before.

unnormalised: A quick reminder for those traveling or working remotely: calculating time differences can be tricky. Places like Kathmandu are ahead of us by just a bit, so that's 9:15 AM Nepal Time. Check your local time zones before you start posting spoilers online!
normalised: A quick reminder for those traveling or working remotely: calculating time differences can be tricky. Places like Kathmandu are ahead of us by just a bit, so that's nine fifteen A-M Nepal Time. Check your local time zones before you start posting spoilers online!

unnormalised: Basically, wherever you are, make sure you know your local time relative to AEDT to catch the match. Let's go, India! Hope our team wins by a big margin.
normalised: Basically, wherever you are, make sure you know your local time relative to A-E-D-T to catch the match. Let's go, India! Hope our team wins by a big margin.
